## Projecció de la classificació final

* [Evolució de la classificació projectada](https://futstat.cat/projeccions/primera-evolucio/)
<br>
* [Probabilitats dels pròxims partits](https://futstat.cat/projeccions/primera-partits/)
<br>
<br>
```{r echo=F}
library(kableExtra)
table <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/final-primera.csv")
kable(table, digits = 1, align = "lccccccc", row.names = FALSE, col.names = c("Club", "Punts", "GD", "Campió", "UCL", "Descens", "Atacar", "Defensar"))  %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "responsive"), fixed_thead = T) %>%
  add_header_above(c("2019-2020" = 1, "Projeccions" = 2, "Probabilitats" = 3, "Rànquings" = 2), background = "white") %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = T, color = "#303030") %>%
  row_spec(1, background = "#c7ffd0") %>%
  row_spec(2, background = "#fffad1") %>%
  row_spec(3, background = "#fffbdb") %>%
  row_spec(4, background = "#fffce5") %>%
  row_spec(5:17, background = "#ffffff") %>%
  row_spec(18, background = "#ffe7e5") %>%
  row_spec(19, background = "#ffdedb") %>%
  row_spec(20, background = "#ffd5d1") %>%
  footnote(general = format(Sys.time(), "%d %b %Y, %X"), general_title = "Actualitzat:", footnote_as_chunk = T)
```
